Actually, careful: "X is Y's descendant" means X is descendant of Y, so Y is ancestor of X, so Y -> X. Conversely, "X is Y's ancestor" means X is ancestor of Y, so X -> Y.

Thus we have a directed graph (probably a DAG) of relationships.
